main.name: Sayeem Ahmed
main.bio: My name is Sayeem Ahmed and I am a developer on the Professional Services team at Vidyard. My background is based around web development, and web design. I am regarded as someone who takes mindful but a competitive approach when it comes to completing work. I am fueled by my passion for technology and creating new applications.
main.biop2: Through my experience at Vidyard starting as a Technical Support Specialist to a developer I've gained an enormous amount of experience in project management, training and coaching, soft and technical skills. I've leveraged my critical thinking and management skills not only when developing software, but also while consulting clients on business software solutions and applications.
main.biop3: In my free time I enjoy watching/ learning about how I can become a better developer, going to the gym, rock climbing, and playing soccer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.description: Graduated with academic award of Distinction

work.title: Developer, Professional Services
work.description: This role builds, delivers and maintains critical production software services. It involves working with customer requirements to propose solutions, create prototypes, design, develop, test, deploy and maintain production software services that solve defined customer problems.

work.title: Technical Support Specialist
work.description: This role requires working as part of the Customer Experience team to analyze technical queries and provide solutions to Vidyard's customers regarding the SaaS platform. These queries tend to be regarding (but are not limited to) HTML/CSS Player Embedding, Encoding, Analytics, Video Playback, and Integrations into Salesforce / Marketing Automation Platforms such as Marketo, Eloqua, HubSpot and Act-on.

projects.title: Vidyard CTA Catalog
projects.summary: Standardized menu of Professional Services offerings
projects.description: We want to investigate creating a publicly-accessible webpage that can be sent to customers and prospects to help them visualize opportunities to engage Professional Services for standard event development, which will also serve as a menu of CTAs that qualify as options for standard CTA development. They can view the catalog on their own time prior to purchasing at various stages in Vidyard's sales cycle but likely will be later in the deal cycle or after the decision has been made to purchase Professional Services.

projects.title: Custom Video Hub Layout
projects.summary: Custom built new video hub experience
projects.description: Vidyard will develop custom video hub branding and layout adjustments for Cytiva's video hub.
projects.languages: JavaScript, HTML, SASS, Ruby on Rails

projects.title: Custom Playlist View
projects.summary: Custom playlist experience on a standard Vidyard Branded Sharing Page.
projects.description: Created a custom playlist experience using the Vidyard Player API on a standard Vidyard Branded Sharing Page allowing viewers to navigate between videos in the player's playlist.

projects.title: vy-cli
projects.summary: Vidyard CLI to speed up Call-To-Action development.
projects.description: vy-cli tool that can be used by customer developers to easily develop custom CTAs (local dev server, live reload rather than copy/paste trial and error in the in-platform editor). Great way to empower customers to create CTAs more easily.

projects.title: Lotería - Shopify
projects.summary: Joined the #codeshow to build Lotería in Typescript with React.
projects.description: Had some fun building Lotería with the team and designed it in a way to make it more Shopify themed. Check out the link and try it out!

testimonials.text: Sayeem is a conscientious and extremely focused software developer with whom I feel fortunate to have worked. Sayeem's background working directly with customers serves him extremely well as a developer. His empathy for users and eagerness to understand each use case was very beneficial and enabled him to solve problems in ways that ensured clients got the value they needed from our solutions. His eagerness to learn and develop new skills as well as his collaborative nature make him a great asset for any development team!
testimonials.user: Steve Lyall, Technology Leader & Software Craftsman - Direct Manager

testimonials.text: In my time at Vidyard, I worked with Sayeem on the Professional Services team. He is an outstanding and very positive person to work with. He doesn’t shy away from a challenge and he is super eager to learn. I found mentoring Sayeem, as a software developer, quite rewarding as he was always so keen on learning new things, and then turning around and implementing them. His abilities and knowledge as someone who is self taught, are awesome to behold.
testimonials.text2: Sayeem is one of those co-workers that we all hope to have. He’s always there, supporting clients, supporting team members, and supporting anyone who asks for help. Being a good software developer is not just about technical skills, it is also about soft-skills, and Sayeem excels in his person to person communication, attitude and self-organization.
testimonials.text3: As he keeps leveling up, he’s going to become more of an invaluable software developer than he already is, and any team would be lucky to have him.
testimonials.user: Greg Peterson, Full Stack Developer - Senior Team Member
